gov.va.med.srcalc.vista

Interface VistaDaoFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VistaLinkVistaDaoFactory

    public interface VistaDaoFactory

    Allows clients to construct new VistA DAOs without knowing the implementation.

    This technology-agnostic interface facilitates stubbing out the VistA interface in automated tests.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VistaAuthenticator getAuthenticator(java.lang.String division)
      Returns a VistaAuthenticator that will authenticate users with the given VistA division.
      VistaPatientDao getVistaPatientDao()
      Returns a VistaPatientDao that will execute under the context of the current user.
      VistaSurgeryDao getVistaSurgeryDao()
      Returns a VistaSurgeryDao that will execute under the context of the current user.
      boolean isDivisionKnown(java.lang.String division)
      Returns true if this factory can instantiate objects to communicate with the given VistA division, false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • isDivisionKnown

        boolean isDivisionKnown(java.lang.String division)
        Returns true if this factory can instantiate objects to communicate with the given VistA division, false otherwise.

      • getAuthenticator

        VistaAuthenticator getAuthenticator(java.lang.String division)

        Returns a VistaAuthenticator that will authenticate users with the given VistA division.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the division is unknown

      • getVistaPatientDao

        VistaPatientDao getVistaPatientDao()

        Returns a VistaPatientDao that will execute under the context of the current user.

        Note that the division is implied in the current user context.

        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the VistA communication is somehow misconfigured

      • getVistaSurgeryDao

        VistaSurgeryDao getVistaSurgeryDao()

        Returns a VistaSurgeryDao that will execute under the context of the current user.

        Note that the division is implied in the current user context.

        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the VistA communication is somehow misconfigured
